segments.text: I'm watching the little girl standing near the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not on the stool, but she's definitely part of this operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so attentive and expectant, just looking up at him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear her silent plea for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's rather sweet, her trusting him to get the goods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're quite the little team, working together for their forbidden snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine they've planned this cookie heist quite carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile, seeing their focused determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems oblivious to the overflowing sink, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All her attention is on that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sneaky little adventure, but a fun one for them.
segments.speaker: PAR
